dict.string: Chronicle collects device usage data for the study in which this device is enrolled. This data is used by the researchers running your study to understand how the participant uses the device by calculating things such as the hourly and daily averages of pickups, total usage time, and hourly/daily app usage time by app category. A device can only be enrolled in one study at a time. To unenroll a device from a study, simply uninstall the application.

Chronicle collects keyboad metrics data for the study in which this device is enrolled. This data is used by the researchers running your study to understand the participant use of the keyboard such as number of emojis and sentiment of completed words. A device can only be enrolled in one study at a time. To unenroll a device from a study, simply uninstall the application.

Chronicle collects message usage data for the study in which this device is enrolled. This data is used by the researchers running your study to understand participant’s frequency of text messaging and to understand the number of different people the participant is communicating with on a daily basis. A device can only be enrolled in one study at a time. To unenroll a device from a study, simply uninstall the application.

Chronicle collects phone usage data for the study in which this device is enrolled. This data is used by the researchers running your study to understand participant’s frequency of phone calls and to understand the number of different people the participant is communicating with on a daily basis. A device can only be enrolled in one study at a time. To unenroll a device from a study, simply uninstall the application.
Chronicle would like read your step data in order to read sensors in the background
Chronicle would like to write step data in order to work withs sensors in the background
